creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: mounted fan painting: man in white robe holding a calligraphy brush up to the side of a small cliff or rock formation covered with foliage; shorter man behind him leans over a rock, looking on; ivory roller ends
medium: Ink and gold on mica-coated paper
object_name: Folding fan mounted on hanging scroll
title: Kanzan and Jittoku
